member.name: T:Magna.DualTester.Plc.Core.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.name: P:Magna.DualTester.Plc.Core.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Magna.DualTester.Plc.Core.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Magna.DualTester.Plc.Core.Tools.AsConnection`1
member.summary: Created to make an easy to use interface for accessing the plc.

member.name: M:Magna.DualTester.Plc.Core.Tools.AsConnection`1.#ctor(Magna.DualTester.Plc.Core.IPlcCfgFactory,Magna.DualTester.Core.IPlcAlertService,Magna.DualTester.Plc.Core.IAsTest)
member.summary: This sub initializes all the main components for reading the plc.

member.name: M:Magna.DualTester.Plc.Core.Tools.AsConnection`1.Item_DataChangedEventHandler(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: This sub will attempt to read the plc. If it cannot however it will attempt to rerun Init.
member.remarks: It might be a bad idea to rerun Init from here.
